title: Hilltop's Grant Recommends Buying Closed-End Bond Funds (Audio)
itunes:title: Hilltop's Grant Recommends Buying Closed-End Bond Funds (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Mark Grant, Chief Fixed Income Strategist at Hilltop Securities, on the fixed income markets, and his forecast for rate hikes.
